programme.title: The Encore Hour
programme.desc: A look at some of the drama programmes coming up on the channel this month.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: James reluctantly allows Georgina to throw a party at Eaton Place on the same day the new governess is expected to arrive, leaving both Hudson and the children with reservations.(n)

programme.title: The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A racehorse trainer asks Holmes to investigate the mysterious disappearance of one of his cash-strapped employer's many creditors. Victorian whodunit, starring Jeremy Brett and Edward Hardwicke, with a young Jude Law in an early supporting role.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Nick is left with a sore head following an incident in a graveyard, and Blaketon experiences trouble at home. Rural drama, starring Nick Berry and Derek Fowlds.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The Belgian detective begins to suspect something is amiss when he visits one of his favoured haunts in London for dinner and discovers a fellow regular has dramatically changed his diet. Down in Brighton, elderly Anthony Gascoigne lies dying while his estranged twin brother Henry falls to his death - but nobody is sure whether the man was deliberately pushed. Bizarrely, the key to the riddle seems to lie in a blackberry pie. David Suchet stars in the title role, with Philip Jackson, Hugh Fraser and Pauline Moran.(n)

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: The village is shocked when a dead baby is discovered on the moors and a homeless teenage girl is suspected of being the mother. The police launch an appeal for information but their only clue is a silver crucifix found nearby. Medical drama, starring Amanda Burton.(n)

programme.title: Kavanagh QC
programme.desc: A brother and sister stand accused of murdering their father and stepmother, and pleading for them proves to be the most complex assignment of Kavanagh's entire career. The task is made doubly difficult by the man's insistence on defending himself and a tragedy within his own family - and Julia's decision to leave chambers does not help either. Legal drama, starring John Thaw, Anna Chancellor and Art Malik.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A hit-and-run incident alerts Nick to the presence of badger-baiters in the village, but the outsiders from Middlesbrough will stop at nothing in pursuit of their `sport'. Meanwhile, Greengrass finds a way of making racehorse ownership pay.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: James and Virginia fail to return from a pleasure flight, sparking new fears of tragedy in the Bellamy household. Richard fears his wife and son have eloped and gives them a dressing down when they eventually come home.(n)

programme.title: The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A desperate girl contacts Holmes and asks him to clear her boyfriend of killing his father, a farmer found bludgeoned to death beside a lake. Period drama, starring Jeremy Brett , Peter Vaughan and James Purefoy.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.sub-title: The Adventure of the Clapham Cook
programme.desc: The dapper Belgian detective, who usually only accepts cases of national importance, bends his rules for once and finds himself in run-down Clapham. He investigates the disappearance of a local cook and becomes intrigued by the contents of the woman's trunk. David Suchet stars, alongside Hugh Fraser and Brigit Forsyth.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A woman's body is discovered in Captain Hastings' garage on Bonfire Night. It transpires that the deceased was due to marry an MP - and although the evidence suggests suicide, the Belgian detective suspects foul play. David Suchet, Hugh Fraser and Philip Jackson star.(n)

programme.title: The Last Weekend
programme.desc: The rivalry between Ian and Ollie intensifies during the second leg of their competition, and the oppressive heat serves only to heighten the tension as the late summer break continues. The atmosphere is made worse by the arrival of Daisy's colleague Milo, who brings out even more of Ian's jealous streak. Suspense thriller adapted from the novel by Blake Morrison, starring Rupert Penry-Jones, Shaun Evans, Genevieve O'Reilly and Claire Keelan.(n)

programme.title: Jordskott
programme.desc: Panic spreads as five children disappear from Silverhojds children's hospital and explosions in the forest prompt the creature's anger. Mystery thriller, starring Moa Gammel.(n)

programme.title: The Americans
programme.desc: Elizabeth receives a mysterious distress signal, and Philip tries to work out what the consequences of their last operation will be for their family. Outside the consulate, he searches for clues as to who betrayed his fellow agents, knowing he and his loved ones could be the next to fall. Elsewhere, Nina and Stan are presented with unique opportunities. Drama following two Soviet agents living undercover in suburban Washington DC during the 1980s, starring Matthew Rhys and Keri Russell.(n)

programme.title: The Smoke
programme.desc: Mal is not happy about Dennis's reckless behaviour during a training exercise but his complaints to Kev fall on deaf ears - although the watch leader is distracted by the upcoming anniversary of the Churchill estate fire. Frustrations come to a head when the team is called to a dilapidated building to track down a little girl. Unlikely pairing Mal and Asbo venture into the sewers and, due to a lack of radio communication, the crew have no idea what's going on - until a huge gas explosion leaves them fearing the worst.(n)

programme.title: Battlestar Galactica
programme.desc: Helo suspects a doctor may be murdering his patients when racial tensions flare up aboard the Galactica. Meanwhile, there is increasing agitation among the fleet at news of Baltar's forthcoming trial. Sci-fi drama starring Edward James Olmos.(n)

credits.actor: Admiral William Adama : Edward James Olmos

programme.title: My Holiday Hostage Hell
programme.desc: The story of a woman and her mother who became victims of a kidnapping gang while holidaying in Bolivia.(n)

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: Documentary following the Thames Valley Police as they use unmarked cars fitted with on-board video cameras, offering an insight into vehicle crime and how it can be prevented. The programme also features shocking footage of dangerous drivers.(n)

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: A Mardi Gras bash explodes into a free-for-all brawl and angry veterans use home-made flamethrowers against police during a riot. Clip show featuring footage of outrageous situations encountered by officers on the beat.(n)

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: The leader of a group of Delvians tricks the crew of Moya into visiting her temple, where she plans to rob Zhaan of her powers. Sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Browder and Virginia Hey.(n)

programme.title: Must Be the Music
programme.desc: Part two of two. Following the departure of four of the six acts that made the final at the Wembley Arena, the remaining hopefuls go head to head in a bid to win the most public votes and secure the Â£100,000 prize alongside support for an entry into the music industry. Hosted by Fearne Cotton.(n)

programme.title: Bite Size Brainiac
programme.desc: Shortened version of the science show, featuring more outrageous experiments with Vic Reeves, Jon Tickle and the team.(n)

programme.title: A Great British Wedding
programme.desc: Ken wants a quiet stag party but his friends have other ideas, and Stacey and Jerry face mounting odds against a smooth marriage.(n)

programme.title: RSPCA Animal Rescue
programme.desc: Documentary series following the work of RSPCA officers in Australia as they help animals in need.(n)

programme.title: RSPCA Animal Rescue
programme.desc: Documentary series following the work of RSPCA officers in Australia as they help animals in need.(n)

programme.title: Star-Crossed
programme.desc: Sophia enlists Emery's help to research Atrian pregnancies when she comes to suspect Taylor is carrying Drake's baby - but the pair's investigation leads them into danger. Meanwhile, Roman and Castor testify before the Hwatab about the day the spacecraft crashed to Earth. Sci-fi drama, starring Brina Palencia.(n)

programme.title: Jordan & Perri's Ultimate Block Party
programme.desc: Jordan Banjo and Perri Kiely of street-dance crew Diversity surprise groups of youngsters around the country by organising dance parties.(n)

programme.title: Jordan & Perri's Ultimate Block Party
programme.desc: Jordan Banjo and Perri Kiely of street-dance crew Diversity surprise groups of youngsters around the country by organising dance parties.(n)

programme.title: All Aboard: East Coast Trains
programme.desc: At King's Cross station, customer services deal with an irate passenger who claims a ticket machine took his money but failed to produce a travel card, while members of a Scottish football club head to London for their final game of the season. Plus, a few minutes behind schedule, ex-accountant train driver Steve is en route to Newcastle.(n)

programme.title: Ashley Banjo's Secret Street Crew
programme.desc: Ashley Banjo is in Kent to teach a group of dinner ladies to dance, but a lack of spare time for practice means the women struggle to master their moves. Banjo's concerns mount when one member of his new crew skips rehearsal to attend a Take That concert.(n)

programme.title: Star-Crossed
programme.sub-title: Series 1 - 12. This Trick May Chance to Scathe You
programme.desc: Penultimate episode of the high-school sci-fi drama. Roman and Drake uncover the Trags' plot to build a bomb, and realising they can't stop the vigilante mob by themselves, they take the unexpected step of asking Grayson for help. Meanwhile, Emery enlists Sophia and Lukas to smuggle the device out of the Atrian sector - but it's a move that leads them all into grave danger.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The case involving Arkady and his personal connection to the oil tanker leads Callen, Sam, Deeks and Kensi to Moscow, where the team must assume multiple undercover identities to locate the suspects. At the same time, Callen learns more about his father. Starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: Show Me Your Garden 05 August 2015 Sky2| Series 1 - Episode 1
programme.desc: Green-fingered enthusiasts from across Britain allow cameras into their beloved gardens, as three hopefuls take it in turns to visit and judge each other's pride and joy. The first programme comes from London, where retired paediatrician Malkanthie and her husband David, former art teachers Barbara and Marek, and ex-advertising executive Edwina and her husband Nigel compete. Narrated by Alison Steadman.(n)

programme.title: The Fanatics
programme.desc: Baz Ashmawy hosts this game show in which three contestants who take their hobbies to the extreme - be it their love of a TV show, a comic book or simply eating chocolate - compete in a series of challenges to be crowned the ultimate fanatic. Up for grabs is a piece of memorabilia of their own choosing. First up is a Whovian - known to the general public as a Doctor Who fan - a boxing aficionado and a contestant who knows a thing or two about the London Underground.(n)

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Despite differing approaches to the investigation, Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a fugitive.(n)

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter 05 August 2015 Sky2| 05/08/2015
programme.desc: Documentary series following the Chapmans, a family of bounty hunters led by Duane `Dog' Chapman.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Series 3 - 21. Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.desc: Rommie's former lover takes over her mind and seizes control of a new High Guard ship. Guest starring Christopher Judge and Michael Shanks.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Series 3 - 22. Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.desc: The ship is attacked by the Dragons and the crew uncovers Tyr's treachery - leading to the destruction of the Commonwealth. Sci-fi adventure, starring Kevin Sorbo and Lisa Ryder.(n)

programme.title: OAP Internet Virgins
programme.desc: Online comedian and presenter Mawaan attempts to teach 77-year-old flower arranger and internet novice Irene the wonders of the World Wide Web.(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own 05 August 2015 Sky2| Series 2 - Episode 3
programme.desc: James Corden hosts the sports-based comedy quiz, joined by team captains former footballer Jamie Redknapp and ex-cricket player Andrew `Freddie' Flintoff. Comedian Rob Brydon and athlete Jessica Ennis-Hill join regular panellists John Bishop and Georgie Thompson.(n)

programme.title: The Kumars
programme.sub-title: Series 1 - 1. Daniel Radcliffe, Chevy Chase & Olivia Colman
programme.desc: The home-made family chat show returns to TV after a seven-year break, with aspiring star Sanjeev (Sanjeev Bhaskar) still at the helm, while Grandma and dad Ashwin (Meera Syal and Vincent Ebrahim) join in with the questioning. Guests on the first show are Daniel Radcliffe, currently filming a new Frankenstein movie, American funnyman Chevy Chase and award-winning actress Olivia Colman.(n)

programme.title: Ascension 05 August 2015 Sky2| Series 1 - Episode 1
programme.desc: In 1963, President Kennedy is convinced the Cold War is going to lead to the Earth's destruction, so he sends 600 men, women and children into space to find a new world to populate. This sci-fi drama picks up 50 years into the Ascension's century-long voyage. Captain William Denniger and his wife Viondra rule the ship's population, while the bottom deck dwellers are made to know their place. However, the boat is rocked by a murder, and as the search for the killer begins, the crew members are forced to question the very nature of their cause. Tricia Helfer and Brian Van Holt star.(n)

programme.title: Ascension 05 August 2015 Sky2| Series 1 - Episode 2
programme.desc: A radiation storm approaches and a sedated sleep is forced on those on board the spaceship, but it soon comes to light that not everyone is out for the count. Sci-fi drama, starring Tricia Helfer and Brandon P Bell.(n)

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Stan finally saves enough money to join the golf club he has worked at for the past 30 summers - only to discover Steve has been given a membership before him. However, everything changes when the CIA officer learns who owns the business. Featuring the voice of Hulk Hogan.(n)

programme.title: Falling Skies
programme.desc: Hal and Isabella's romance grows as they search for Tom, who has taken refuge with a unique family, and resistance movement the 2nd Mass locates an Espheni device.(n)

programme.title: The Cleveland Show
programme.sub-title: Series 1 - 2. Da Doggone Daddy-Daughter Dinner Dance
programme.desc: Cleveland asks his stepdaughter to the school dance in the hope that she will like him more, but a mishap with the family pet ruins his plan. Meanwhile, Cleveland Jr has trouble fitting in at school. Family Guy spin-off, following the animated adventures of Peter Griffin's former neighbour.(n)

credits.actor: Cleveland Brown Jr : Kevin Michael Richardson

programme.title: The Cleveland Show
programme.desc: Cleveland invites a neighbour's youngster round in a bid to help his son make more friends, but struggles to get rid of him when he outstays his welcome and declares he would rather live with them than his own dad. Eventually it becomes clear that social services will be needed to remove the unwanted guest.(n)

credits.actor: Cleveland Brown Jr : Kevin Michael Richardson

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Series 4 - 8. 8 Simple Rules for Buying My Teenage Daughter
programme.desc: Peter runs up a massive bill at the pharmacy and decides to sell Meg to the Goldmans to help pay it off - much to their son Neil's delight. However, she becomes jealous when he starts dating someone else. Meanwhile, Stewie falls in love with his new babysitter.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Series 4 - 9. Breaking Out Is Hard to Do
programme.desc: Lois is sent to prison for persistent shoplifting, plunging the family into such disarray that Peter feels obliged to help her escape. Forced to go on the run, they take refuge in `Asian Town' - where Joe eventually tracks them down.(n)

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: A jealous Francine tries to break up Stan's renewed relationship with a former girlfriend, only to unwittingly leave Roger at the mercy of an alien-hunter. Elsewhere, Steve accidentally wears Hayley's panties to school, and finds they bring him luck.(n)

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Fr Donovan organises a Christmas play at the shopping centre, and casts Stan as Santa Claus and Roger as Jesus - but they land themselves in trouble after getting into a fight with each other. Elsewhere, Hayley and Jeff adopt a child, who turns out to be possessed.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Medium
programme.desc: Joe's partnership with Meghan Doyle is jeopardised, and Allison's dreams lead her and Scanlon to the killer of a drug dealer - a severely disabled man with a bullet lodged in his brain. Guest starring Miguel Ferrer and Kelly Preston.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Series 7 - 9. Mr Monk and the Miracle
programme.desc: Three homeless men suspect their friend has been murdered and seek to hire Adrian to investigate. It is an unconventional brief, but Natalie suggests that he finds it in his heart to help them during the Christmas season. Meanwhile, Stottlemeyer seeks treatment for his back pain at an apparently miraculous well.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Four men discover they are all being blackmailed over the death of a friend who drowned under puzzling circumstances more than two decades previously, so they get together to discuss their options. The next morning one of them is discovered bludgeoned to death near his home, and Nichols and Stevens investigate - uncovering a mystery that spans 22 years.(n)

credits.actor: Capt Zoe Callas : Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The team is faced with a lengthy list of potential suspects while investigating the murder of a magazine editor whose abrasive personality won him many enemies as well as friends. The case takes a turn for the worse when one of the victim's colleagues is also killed, but the detectives are able to link his death to the Russian mafia. Crime drama, starring Jeff Goldblum and Leslie Hendrix.(n)

credits.actor: Capt Zoe Callas : Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and Rigsby travel to Crane Creek, where they examine the murder of a film-maker who has been shot at close range. The local police identify a man who was accused of killing his wife two years previously as the main suspect, but when the agents close in, he takes the employees and customers at City Hall hostage, including Jane, who was settling a parking fine at the time. Crime drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The agents reluctantly team up with the coast guard to investigate the apparent murder of a Navy diver who was trying to recover a sunken ship and its treasure, and Gibbs finds a prime suspect in a wealthy doctor who had bankrolled the underwater mission. Starring Mark Harmon.(n)

credits.actor: Special Agent Abigail Borin : Diane Neal

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A reporter for the Navy Times is found stabbed to death - and the team learns he had been going to meet a call girl linked to three other murders. Gibbs decides to ask former madam Holly Snow for help in tracking her down. Crime drama, guest starring Dina Meyer (Saw), with Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: Medium
programme.desc: Allison helps a couple who believe their house is haunted, and an unexpected situation occurs between Devalos and Tom Van Dyke. Meanwhile, Joe is galvanised into action by the discovery that Meghan Doyle wants to sell her controlling interest in his invention.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A woman's body is discovered in an empty swimming pool and all the evidence points to her husband being the prime suspect, but the post-mortem indicates that the victim's vital signs were being monitored and that she was restrained before being shot. Nichols and Stevens find that there have been three similar cases during the previous four years and that the people involved were part of a warped psychological study. Guest starring Dallas Roberts (The Walking Dead, Rubicon).(n)

credits.actor: Capt Zoe Callas : Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Nichols and Stevens investigate the murder of a woman who was found lying in the street, apparently strangled to death, and with a concealed wound on her cheek. When tests reveal traces of alcohol and Valium in her system, Stevens contemplates the plausibility of a medical connection, a suspicion that is soon confirmed when a woman with a recently treated hand injury is found murdered in exactly the same manner. Their investigation then heads to the local community hospital where the victims were last seen alive. Starring Jeff Goldblum and Saffron Burrows.(n)

credits.actor: Capt Zoe Callas : Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Van Pelt looks after a man who is willing to testify against a drug dealer, but her career is put in jeopardy when the witness is murdered. Crime drama, starring Amanda Righetti.(n)

Living completely off-grid, with no electricity or running water, and facing temperatures that can go as low as minus 30C, simply surviving is a challenge. programme.desc: Frank insights into office life, from an age when the workplace could be a sexual minefield, to the introduction of sexual harassment laws and equality legislation. programme.title: Ross Kemp: Extreme World
programme.desc: Ross stays close to home for the final film, investigating how British seaside towns have been affected by the boom in cheap foreign holidays. Once celebrated, coastal resorts are now in the grip of once unimaginable levels of social decline. Many have become unemployment black spots, while former hotels and guest houses are being used to home the country's most vulnerable residents. Ross visits the worst affected areas to investigate the realities behind their tragic decline, and to find out what can be done to revive their fortunes. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Ross Kemp: Extreme World
programme.desc: Ross travels to Calais, where there are thought to be more than 3,000 migrants living in squalor, all with the same goal - to reach the shores of the UK and claim asylum from the politically corrupt and, in some cases, violent countries from which they have fled. Some fail to make the 21-mile trip across the English Channel, some die or suffer injuries, and others are arrested. But as Ross learns, most come back another day to try their luck again.(n)

Comedy, directed by and starring Lake Bell. With Rob Corddry.(n)

programme.desc: The making of the new action movie, in which Tom Cruise returns yet again as daring agent Ethan Hunt.(n)

A small band of monsters join forces to prevent the egg from falling into the wrong hands. Animated adventure, with the voices of Emma Tate and Ashley Slater.(n)

programme.title: Jayne Mansfield's Car
programme.desc: An Alabama woman who left her husband for an Englishman dies in 1969, and her will dictates that she wishes to be buried in her home state. The arrangement results in an awkward first encounter for her two husbands and their families. Drama, directed by and starring Billy Bob Thornton. With Robert Duvall, John Hurt and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man: Behind the Scenes
programme.desc: The making of new Marvel movie Ant-Man, starring Paul Rudd as the tiny hero.(n)

Comedy sequel, starring Kevin Hart and Regina Hall.(n)

Animated sci-fi comedy, with the voices of Rob Corddry, Brendan Fraser and Sarah Jessica Parker.(n)

programme.title: Return to Nim's Island

programme.title: The Fault in Our Stars
programme.desc: Indianapolis teenager Hazel has terminal thyroid cancer and attends a patients' support group, where she meets fellow teen Gus, who lost a leg to the disease. The two fall in love and a shared passion for books leads them on a literary pilgrimage to Amsterdam in search of reclusive author Peter van Houten. Romantic drama based on the bestselling novel by John Green, starring Shailene Woodley, Ansel Elgort, Laura Dern and Willem Dafoe.(n)

Martin Scorsese's fact-based drama, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill and Matthew McConaughey.(n)

programme.desc: Comedy starring Jason Biggs. Four teenage boys pledge to lose their virginity before their high-school prom, but their efforts have hilarious and outrageous consequences.(n)

programme.title: Turbo Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane finds out about the making of the animated comedy about a super-fast snail.(n)

programme.title: Syrup
programme.desc: A marketing graduate comes up with an idea for a new campaign that could make him rich. However, after being betrayed by a conniving colleague, he starts to become aware of the ruthlessness and duplicity in the advertising industry and seeks a way to reclaim his morality. Satirical comedy based on Max Barry's novel, starring Shiloh Fernandez and Amber Heard.(n)

programme.title: Dave

Baltimore businessman Dave Kovic bears such a striking resemblance to the President of the United States that he is occasionally called upon to do impersonations. Starring James Corden, Julie Walters, Colm Meaney and Mackenzie Crook.(n)

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: A sixtysomething confirmed bachelor finally decides to settle down with his much younger girlfriend. Comedy, starring Michael Douglas, Robert De Niro, Morgan Freeman and Kevin Kline.(n)

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead

Can Shaun and best mate Ed fight off the marauding hordes of the undead and win back Shaun's girlfriend? Or will they just go down the pub.(n)

During the risky endeavour, Arthur begins to doubt his faith and allegiance to Rome, and teams up with the Britons in a desperate attempt to defeat the invaders.(n)

On the verge of release from a psychiatric hospital after years of treatment, former Chief Inspector Dreyfus is driven mad by a chance encounter with the innocent cause of his breakdown, Jacques Clouseau. programme.title: Revenge of the Pink Panther
programme.desc: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau's adventures seem to have come to an end when he is mistakenly declared dead. However, the disaster-prone detective is in fact alive and well, and takes advantage of the situation to launch an undercover investigation into his own murder, adopting a variety of cunning disguises. Comedy sequel, starring Peter Sellers, Herbert Lom, Burt Kwouk and Dyan Cannon.(n)

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Audrey Hepburn and George Peppard. Paul Varjak, a young writer, finds himself falling for his new neighbour, the volatile and extravagant Holly Golightly. But her ambition is to marry a millionaire.(n)

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The eccentric detective and his confidant Dr Watson investigate the apparent resurrection of a criminal mastermind with links to the occult, who is carrying out a series of seemingly magical murders. The case is complicated by the reappearance of Holmes' duplicitous old flame Irene Adler. Action thriller, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong and Eddie Marsan.(n)

programme.title: Niagara
programme.desc: Thriller starring Marilyn Monroe and Joseph Cotten. While honeymooning at Niagara Falls, newlyweds Polly and Ray Cutler grow suspicious that an adulterous young wife is planning her husband's murder.(n)

But things take a turn for the worse when Troy regains consciousness, steals Archer's face and assumes the lawman's identity.(n)

programme.title: Live International Champions Cup Football
programme.desc: Chelsea v Fiorentina (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the pre-season encounter at Stamford Bridge, as the English champions take on the team that finished fourth in Serie A. Having faced Arsenal in the FA Community Shield on Sunday and with the opening match of the new Premier League campaign just three days away, it remains to be seen what sort of side Jose Mourinho will put out tonight. In contrast, the Italian outfit still a little over two weeks away from the beginning of the Serie A season, so will see this as an ideal opportunity to continue their own preparations.(n)

programme.desc: A look back at the fourth day of the Second Test in 2005, which was staged at Edgbaston, and saw England claim a victory by the smallest margin in Ashes history. programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: When Lily is upset to realise Matt is going out with cool girl Greta Masters, Jas plans a make-over slumber party to cheer her up. Unfortunately it clashes with a rare comet sighting, which Martha and Ollie are desperate to experience. They have even been allowed to borrow the very precious school telescope for the evening. Ollie is smuggled in to Lily's house by Martha to watch secretly from the attic, with Martha planning to split her time between both events. After much chaos and confusion, and with the presence of Ollie in the house rumbled, a compromise is finally reached, where the girls all get to do both the make-over and watch the rare comet. At the end of the make-over session Martha and Jas are horrified to see Lily has transformed herself to look exactly like Greta in a bid to impress Matt. To spare Lily's feelings they pretend to like her new look, but are relieved the next day in school to see Lily returned to her normal, natural self. Lily has realised it's better to be yourself, rather than try and change who you are just to please others.(n)
